message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional value, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $140 for this product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product. This is a slight increase from my previous offer, aiming to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $130. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $132.50? I think this is a fair compromise.

I see your point, Bob. Let's try to find a common ground. I propose a price of $134 for the product. This is a reasonable increase from my previous offer and closer to your proposed price. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $131? I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to agree on a price of $132 for the product. This is a fair compromise between our previous offers, and I believe it will satisfy both of our expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $129? I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Considering our previous discussions and your feedback, I am willing to agree on a price of $128 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise and will allow us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I've reached my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $125. If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to reconsider the purchase and look elsewhere.
